name: BallPuzzle
description:
to be honest, this is not the best(nor the worst game I've made, maybe it's the worsted game I've released though) but I decided to release its project files might be helpful(i think), anyway I hope you like it :) 

there are 5 levels(but each level can probably be done in different ways, I know most can)

controls:

mouse left click or touch on light green rectangles

if it feels like the control don't work then its because if your click on more than 2 of the green rectangles then it won't work(i did this because I didn't want to make more than 1 of them be removed at the same time)
